dialog.text: The bottom half is covered with grass. There is a thin layer of bush going from the right to almost the left, near top of the grass.
Are the bushes at the horizon or underneath it?
Got it, is there anything else in the grass?
Nope. Above the grass, there is very dense range of trees, going all the way from right to left and rolling up like a ball near the left edge, touching the top.
How tall are the trees on the right side?
On the right, they go up by about one quarter of the image height. The top of the trees in general is curly jagged.
Got it, what is the weather like?
The sky is blue and almost all of it is covered with clouds (above the trees).
Is there anywhere in the sky that is not covered with clouds?
Yes, just some very small areas on the right of the tall cloud ball (on the left).
